column1: 1,Verify Checkout Process for Indoor Plants Selection,"Navigate to the home page, sign in, select indoor plants, proceed to checkout, and complete the payment process using a credit card.","Step 1: Navigate to https://eco.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link signIn -> Navigate to page 'signin'
Step 4: Click on link shop2 -> Navigate to page 'shop'
Step 7: Select size, add to basket, and proceed to checkout

column2: - Step 1: Click on div selectSize
- Step 2: Click on div object
- Step 3: Click on button addToBasket
- Step 4: Click on button addToBasket
- Step 5: Click on span navigationButton
- Step 6: Click on input fullName

column1: Step 8: Complete checkout process with credit card payment

column2: - Step 1: Click on button nextStep -> Navigate to page 'checkout/step2'
- Step 2: Enter input value in input fullName
- Step 3: Enter input value in input emailAddress
- Step 4: Enter input value in input shippingAddress
- Step 5: Enter input value in input 09254461351
- Step 6: Click on header mainH5
- Step 7: Click on checkbox shippingOption
- Step 8: Click on button nextStep2 -> Navigate to page 'checkout/step3'
- Step 9: Click on input creditCardPayWithVisa
- Step 10: Click on radio creditCardPayWithVisa
- Step 11: Enter input value in input nameOnCard
- Step 12: Enter input value in input cardNumber
- Step 13: Enter input value in input ccv
- Step 14: Click on button confirm
